thread.title: BRIEF-Archos says proceeded with drawdown of 2.3 mln euro OCABSA tranche
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Archos says proceeded with drawdown of 2.3 mln euro OCABSA tranche | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Archos says proceeded with drawdown of 2.3 mln euro OCABSA tranche
text:
Oct 14 Archos SA :
* Announced on Tuesday it has proceeded with the drawdown of a second OCABSA tranche worth 2.3 million euros ($2.6 million)
* The drawdown involves issuing 236 OCA convertible bonds with nominal value of 10,000 euros each, representing a 2.36 million euro bond issue, accompanied with BSA share subscription warrants
Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: ($1 = 0.8779 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom)
